sections.text:
History:Laws 1989, ch. 137, § 1; 1997, ch. 236, § 1; repealed by Laws 2003, ch. 153, § 73.

Repeals.— Laws 2003, ch. 153, § 73 repealed 22-13A-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1989, ch. 137, § 1, relating to the short title, effective April 4, 2003. For provisions of former section,seethe 2002 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 1989, ch. 137, § 2; 1997, ch. 236, § 2; repealed by Laws 2003, ch. 153, § 73.

sections.heading: Repealed.
